entry.title: KID'S SHORT RAGLAN SET
entry.summary:
Vendor: BLARA
Type: ACCESSORIES
Price: 105.00

Crafted from organic cotton, this two-piece loungewear for kids is made of soft, lightweight, and stretchy jersey. A crew-neck raglan top with contrasting short sleeves, and trousers with elastic waistband.

  • Style# BLRST210100802
  • Fabric: Spandex Jersey (95% organic cotton, 5% spandex)
  • Designed in Canada
  • Made in China
Organic Cotton
  • Our products are made with you, your family and our planet in mind! The cotton used in our collections is certified organic by GOTS, which guarantees that our fabrics must be produced without the use of pesticides, synthetic fertilizers, and genetically engineered seeds.
Natural Dye
  • Using plants, fruits, and traditional Chinese medicinal products we are able to dye our fabrics without adding any harmful chemicals. This innovative technology is good for you, your loved ones and our planet!

entry.title: OFFSET COLORBLOCK T-SHIRT(OCEAN BLUE/NATURAL)
entry.summary:
Vendor: BLARA
Type: BOYS
Price: 58.00

Styled with an asymmetrical seam in the middle, the t-shirt reveals a refreshing street vibe. The right side of the bodice is cut from the jersey for a soft touch, while the left is woven fabrics, the typical fabric for a tailored shirt. When these two different types of fabrics are combined this way, everyone knows it's incomparable.

  • Style# BLRTS210101013
  • Fabric: Sueded Oxford (100% organic cotton)
    Double Spandex Jersey (95% organic cotton, 5% spandex)
  • Designed in Canada
  • Made in China
